directions.step:
Bring water and salt to a boil; add ookles, stir, cook 10 minutes or until just tender. Drain and pour hot water over noodles in colander.
Melt butter in a saucepan; blend in almonds; add noodles and stir over low heat until nookles are heated and almonds are distributed.
SOURCE: Indianapolis Star 3/7/84 =-
